Part of Khadlaj's prestigious Maison collection, Creation De Reve (meaning "Creation of Dreams") lives up to its poetic name. This new arrival has quickly gained recognition for its artful balance between traditional Arabic perfumery and modern sophistication.

Khadlaj Perfumes, established in the UAE, has built its reputation on creating authentic oriental fragrances that honor Middle Eastern perfume traditions while appealing to international tastes. Their master perfumers select only the finest ingredients, ensuring each creation tells a unique olfactory story.

Frequently Asked Question

How long does Khadlaj Maison Creation De Reve last on skin?
Creation De Reve is formulated with high-quality concentrated oils that provide exceptional longevity. Most users report 8-10 hours of noticeable fragrance presence, with the rich base notes of oud, vanilla and musk lingering for up to 12+ hours. For maximum longevity, apply to pulse points on moisturized skin. The fragrance also leaves a memorable scent trail that others will notice throughout the day. âœ¨
